name: JEAN HERBAUT
title: Project Manager ‚Äì Business Analyst
profile: Experienced Project Manager with a strong background in project management and a passion for sports. Currently working as a Business Analyst in e-Government for the State of Vaud. Proven track record in managing complex projects in international settings, with excellent communication skills and the ability to thrive in multicultural and multidisciplinary team environments. Bilingual in English and French.

projectManagement: Planning and coordination of complex projects
Business plan development and budget tracking
businessAnalysis: Solution development tailored to client needs
technologies: Microsoft Tools: Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint
Web Development: JS, MySQL, PHP, HTML5
